name: Jabba, This Is Your Last Chance!
Lore: 'With a quick motion of his hand, Luke signaled Artoo and dramatically changed the situation.',
Text: 'Deploy on table with 5 cards from outside your deck face down under here. Twice per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here (as if from hand). If Quiet Mining Colony or Independent Operation on table, lightsabers may not add to Force drains or ''swing'' more than once per battle. Cloud City Celebration is canceled.',
